Summary: Dream event only, but may be significant.
divs: sighting detailsi dreamed of being on a ufo which was in distress. the ship was tilting by the weight of a water solution that seemed to be flowing from one side of the ship to the other and made the ship list from the weight of the water flowing from one side to the other; yet at the same time the water flow threatened to flip the space ship over in mid-air. i thought that maybe the water was used as a coolant for the engine. the ship was manned by human beings (it appeared.) i witnessed their view through their windows and saw, off in the horizon on earth, a very specific geographic area of the earth which was covered in ice and snow. the people onboard the space ship were unsure as to whether this flip of the space ship might not be actually pre-planned as a measure to keep the engines cool during this flight, so they dealt with this dilemma calmly. yes, this was only a dream. however, this was quite the unusual dream and very specific. hope this helps, or opens up some new avenue for discussion on ufo sightings and dreaming.... sincerely, [cms\tg\pid]
